projects.name: Project Elevate – Newark Resident Service Platform
projects.summary: A web application that modernizes how Newark’s Department of Public Works (DPW) collaborates with residents, combines AI-driven communication, smart incident reporting, and real-time crew workflows to keep the city cleaner while cutting costs.
description: AI-powered chat window for direct resident-to-DPW communication.
GPS-tagged photo reporting for litter, potholes, and illegal dumping.
Real-time crew routing, status updates, and proof-of-completion images.
Dynamic calendar reminders for trash, recycling, and bulk-pickup days.
Analytics dashboard that reduces fuel costs and manpower through optimized routing.

pillars.title: Two-way communication
capabilities: AI chat window for questions, complaints, or bulk-pickup requests
Instant routing of messages to the correct DPW or Code-Enforcement team

pillars.title: Smart incident reporting
capabilities: Photo upload with automatic GPS extraction and classification
Live city map for crews to triage litter, potholes, or illegal dumping

pillars.title: Real-time service tracking
capabilities: Mobile login for sanitation crews
Optimized route maps, status updates, and “after” photos visible to the public

pillars.title: Citywide scheduling hub
capabilities: Dynamic calendars for trash, recycling, and bulk-item days
Neighborhood-specific reminders to reduce missed pickups

pillars.title: Operational efficiency
capabilities: Automated routing and clustering to save fuel and manpower
Dashboards revealing hotspots and crew performance

projects.impact: Shorter response times, cleaner streets, and measurable taxpayer savings; highlighted by Microsoft and cybersecurity partners as a scalable model for other municipalities.

projects.name: Youth Ballot – Next-Generation Civic Engagement & Secure Voting
projects.summary: A mobile-first platform that teaches civic literacy and delivers secure, paper-free elections for students—now expanding to council and assembly races when users turn 18.
description: Age-aware onboarding automatically unlocks council and assembly ballots at 18.
Interactive learning hub with quizzes and bite-sized civic lessons.
AI-moderated chat lets students question candidates on policies and manifestos.
End-to-end-encrypted, WCAG-compliant e-ballots with tamper-proof audit logs.
Live turnout analytics and heat maps for educators and administrators.

pillars.title: Seamless age-based voter eligibility
capabilities: Automatic ballot upgrade to council/assembly races on a student’s 18ᵗʰ birthday
School-verified log-in with no extra paperwork

pillars.title: Interactive civic-learning hub
capabilities: Bite-sized explainers, quizzes, and case studies on democracy and governance
Gamified progress tracking to reinforce lessons

pillars.title: Candidate chat
capabilities: AI-moderated messaging with candidates about policies and manifestos
Direct engagement that bridges the gap between young voters and public servants

pillars.title: Secure, WCAG-compliant e-ballot
capabilities: End-to-end encryption and auditable logs
Multilingual, screen-reader-friendly interface

pillars.title: Live analytics & turnout tools
capabilities: Real-time dashboards for engagement by grade and precinct
Automated, non-spammy reminders to boost turnout

projects.impact: Transforms classroom elections into hands-on democracy, cultivating informed lifelong voters while reducing administrative overhead for schools.

projects.name: School of Thought – AI Chatbot for Learning
projects.summary: A conversational AI platform that delivers personalized study assistance to students and curriculum-planning tools to teachers, reimagining classroom engagement.
description: Context-aware chatbot answers homework questions and explains concepts with citations.
Adaptive learning engine tailors practice problems to each student’s skill gaps.
Teacher dashboard auto-generates lesson plans and formative assessments.
Integrates with Google Classroom and Learning Management Systems (LMS).
Usage analytics help educators identify struggling students early.

pillars.title: Personalized tutoring
capabilities: Conversational AI adapts explanations to a student’s learning style
Progressive hints guide rather than give away answers

pillars.title: Teacher productivity
capabilities: One-click lesson-plan generation aligned to standards
Auto-graded quizzes with item-analysis reports

projects.impact: Improves student outcomes through individualized support while freeing educators from repetitive administrative tasks.

projects.name: DPW AI Camera System
projects.summary: An edge-based computer-vision network that detects and deters illegal dumping across Newark in real time, enabling rapid DPW response and cleaner streets.
description: AI-powered cameras automatically identify illegal dumping events 24/7.
Instant alerts sent to Newark DPW dashboards and mobile devices.
Location-based heat maps reveal dumping hotspots for proactive enforcement.
Edge processing reduces bandwidth costs while maintaining low-latency detection.
Data analytics track incident reductions and ROI on equipment deployment.

pillars.title: Real-time detection
capabilities: Computer-vision models distinguish dumping from normal activity
<1-second alert latency from camera to DPW operator

pillars.title: Smart city integration
capabilities: Dashboard overlays illegal-dumping incidents on Newark GIS layers
API hooks feed enforcement tickets and cleanup work orders

projects.impact: Creates a cleaner, safer city environment while saving cleanup costs and enabling data-driven policy decisions on waste management.
